resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

You must be seeing a pink coloured button on the right end of the page. If you click it you\'ll be redirected to a form where you can add food description (1st column) Then you have to add how much food you want to donate or want to put up a request for. After adding that you can choose if it\'s a donation or a request and if you want/have the food cooked or uncooked. If you are a donor you can add delivery charges if you are up for delivery or leave it to be NA and check the pick-up column Press submit and your request will be posted.

If you click the hamburger item on the top left or swipe right from the left corner a navigation bar will open up. There Donations item will lead you to list of donations and Request item will lead you to food requests by other users. By clicking on Restaurants, you can see a list of restaurants who provide food for NGO\'s or needy at a reasonably cheap prices. Also you can see your donations by clicking on my donations. And the help tab is where you can submit any query of yours related to this app.
